org.netbeans.spi.java.hints

    org.netbeans.spi.java.hints  
  • Classes in org.netbeans.spi.java.hints used by org.netbeans.spi.java.hints 
    Class and Description
    Hint.Kind
    Whether the hint should be considered a hint, e.g.
    Hint.Options
    Various options to altering the behavior of the hint.
    HintContext 
    HintContext.MessageKind 
    HintSeverity
    Severity of hint ERROR - will show up as error WARNING - will show up as warning CURRENT_LINE_WARNING - will only show up when the caret is placed in the erroneous element
    JavaFix.TransformationContext
    A context that contains a reference to a WorkingCopy through which modifications of Java source code can be made.
